channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Glencairn Park Road - street "cleaning", 8th October
item.description:
The street "cleaner" has visited Glencairn Park Road this morning - photos show the mess left behind. All it seems to have done is move the muck from the gutter a few feet out into the road. Needs doing again, properly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1a, Glencairn Park Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The road has weeds growing in cracks half the length of the road, there are many holes and a large dip!, 8th October
item.description:
Poplars Road, this is a bus route and probably damaged by the bus
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Poplars, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Roebock cottages end of Nailsworth terrace, 8th October
item.description:
The drain used to be functioning but neglect and silt has now blocked the drain so it is not even visable to eye. Blocked full of silt

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Milsom Street, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
